TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit AutomationElement/AutomationElementInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 包含 或 屬性所使用的屬性存取子。

span.span: Contains the property accessors used by the or properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可直接從和; 您不需要擷取結構本身。The properties can be accessed directly from and ; you do not need to retrieve the structure itself. 此結構中的屬性也可以擷取使用和，使用對應的識別項從。The properties in this structure can also be retrieved by using and , using the corresponding identifiers from . 例如，屬性由欄位。For example, The property is identified by the field. 這些識別項; 的參考頁面上可用的個別屬性的詳細資訊請參閱 < 備註 > 一節的每個參考主題的連結。More information about the individual properties is available on the reference pages for those identifiers; see the link in the Remarks section of each reference topic. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何屬性擷取自這個結構。The following example shows how the property is retrieved from this structure. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#106)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AcceleratorKey As String
public: property System::String ^ AcceleratorKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得的字串包含項目的快速鍵組合。

span.span: Gets a string containing the accelerator key combinations for the element.

value.span: 此組合鍵順序可叫用與項目關聯的動作。

span.span: The sequence of key combinations that invoke an action associated with the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快速鍵組合來叫用動作。Accelerator key combinations invoke an action. 例如，CTRL + O 通常用於叫用**開啟舊檔** 對話方塊。For example, CTRL + O is often used to invoke the **File Open** dialog box. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 已設定永遠啟動快速鍵按鍵屬性的項目實作類別。 elements that have the accelerator key property set always implement the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AccessKey As String
public: property System::String ^ AccessKey { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得的字串包含項目的便捷鍵字元。

span.span: Gets a string containing the access key character for the element.

value.span: 與項目關聯的字元，用以啟動該項目。

span.span: The character, associated with an element, that is used to activate that element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 便捷鍵是中的功能表、 功能表項目或可啟動附加的功能表功能按鈕等控制項的標籤文字的字元。An access key is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that activates the attached menu function. 比方說，如果找到字母"O"通常用來叫用**開啟**通用對話方塊從**檔案**功能表。For example, the letter "O" is often used to invoke the **Open** file common dialog box from a **File** menu. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 設定永遠將存取屬性的項目實作類別。 elements that have the access key property set always implement the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AutomationId As String
public: property System::String ^ AutomationId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含項目之 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 的字串。

span.span: Gets a string containing the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] for the element.

value.span: 項目是在其容器中的同層級之間的唯一識別碼。

span.span: An ID for an element that is unique among siblings within its container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當有項目的預期保持不變，不論本機語言應用程式的任何執行個體中。When it is available the of an element is expected to always be the same in any instance of the application regardless of the local language. 值應該是整個桌面同層級項目中的唯一性，但不是一定是唯一。The value should be unique among sibling elements but not necessarily unique across the entire desktop. 例如，多個執行個體的應用程式或在 Microsoft Windows 檔案總管 中的多個資料夾檢視可能包含具有相同的項目，例如"SystemMenuBar"。For example, multiple instances of an application, or multiple folder views in Microsoft Windows Explorer, may contain elements with the same , such as "SystemMenuBar". 雖然支援一律建議更好的測試能力，這個屬性不是強制性。While support of an is always recommended for better testability, this property is not mandatory. 支援，where建立測試自動化指令碼的 UI 語言不論執行的是很有用。Where it is supported, an is useful for creating test automation scripts that run regardless of UI language. 用戶端應該作任何假設有關s 由其他應用程式。Clients should make no assumptions regarding the s exposed by other applications. 一定不保證能夠穩定跨不同的版本，或應用程式的組建。An is not necessarily guaranteed to be stable across different releases or builds of an application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BoundingRectangle As Rect
public: property System::Windows::Rect BoundingRectangle { System::Windows::Rect get(); };

summary.span: 取得完全圍住項目的矩形座標。

span.span: Gets the coordinates of the rectangle that completely encloses the element.

value.span: 封入矩形的點座標。

span.span: The point coordinates of the enclosing rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的矩形可以包含沒有任何可點選的點。The returned rectangle can contain points that are not clickable. 在這種情形的執行個體時，就[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]項目具有不規則的形狀或可點選區域或遮蔽其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]項目。Instances where this could happen are when the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item has an irregular shape or clickable region, or it is obscured by other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClassName As String
public: property System::String ^ ClassName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得的字串包含控制項開發人員指定之項目的類別名稱。

span.span: Gets a string containing the class name of the element as assigned by the control developer.

value.span: 控制項開發人員指定的類別名稱。

span.span: The class name assigned by the control developer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值是視實作而定。The value of this property is implementation-dependent. 屬性是用於測試環境。The property is useful in testing environments. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ControlType As ControlType
public: property System::Windows::Automation::ControlType ^ ControlType { System::Windows::Automation::ControlType ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得項目的 。

span.span: Gets the of the element.

value.span: 這個項目的互動模型。

span.span: The interaction model for this element.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項類型所描述的已知的互動模型任意[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目，而不需要依賴當地語系化的控制項類型或複雜的邏輯規則組合。Control type describes a known interaction model for arbitrary [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements without relying on a localized control type or combination of complex logic rules. 這個屬性可以變更在執行階段的唯一情況是支援的控制項。The only case where this property can change at run time is for a control that supports . 範例是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]ListView 控制項，可以變更從至依據目前的檢視。An example is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] ListView control, which can change from to , depending on the current view. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FrameworkId As String
public: property System::String ^ FrameworkId { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得基礎 UI 架構的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the underlying UI framework.

value.span: UI 架構的名稱，如 "Win32"、"WinForm" 或 "DirectUI"。

span.span: The name of the UI framework, such as "Win32", "WinForm", or "DirectUI".

value.span: 預設值為空字串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回屬性的值屬於型別。Return values of the property are of type . 預設值為空字串。The default value is an empty string. 這個屬性可讓特殊案例套用至整個使用者介面架構的應用程式。This property enables applications to apply special cases to entire UI frameworks. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasKeyboardFocus As Boolean
public: property bool HasKeyboardFocus { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值指出項目是否有鍵盤焦點。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the element has keyboard focus.

value.span: 表示項目有鍵盤焦點，否則為 。

span.span: if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果容器內的項目具有焦點，對於容器項目也是如此。If an element within a container has focus, is also true for the container element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HelpText As String
public: property System::String ^ HelpText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與項目相關的說明文字。

span.span: Gets the help text associated with the element.

value.span: 項目的工具提示說明文字。

span.span: The tooltip help text for the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsContentElement As Boolean
public: property bool IsContentElement { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值指出項目是否為內容項目。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the element is a content element.

value.span: 表示項目是內容項目；否則為 。

span.span: if the element is a content element; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容項目包含呈現給使用者的資料。A content element contains data that is presented to the user. 內容項目的範例包括在清單方塊或按鈕在對話方塊中的項目。Examples of content elements are the items in a list box or a button on a dialog box. 非內容項目，也稱為周邊的項目，通常用來管理複合控制項; 中的內容例如，下拉式清單控制項上的按鈕。Non-content elements, also called peripheral elements, are typically used to manipulate the content in a composite control; for example, the button on a drop-down control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsControlElement As Boolean
public: property bool IsControlElement { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值指出是否將項目視為控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the element is viewed as a control.

value.span: 表示將項目視為控制項; 否則為 。

span.span: if the element is viewed as a control; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值指出 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]參考的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 項目是否已啟用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item referenced by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is enabled.

value.span: 如果啟用控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control is enabled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性可變更因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]互動。The value of the property can change because of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] interactions. 您應該藉由呼叫取得更新的快取如果的值自發出快取要求，可能已變更屬性。You should get an updated cache by calling if the value of the property might have changed since you issued the cache request. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsKeyboardFocusable As Boolean
public: property bool IsKeyboardFocusable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目能否接受鍵盤焦點。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element can accept keyboard focus.

value.span: 表示控制項可接收鍵盤焦點；否則為 。

span.span: if the control can receive keyboard focus; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsOffscreen As Boolean
public: property bool IsOffscreen { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值表示螢幕上是否能看見 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is visible on the screen.

value.span: 表示看不到控制項；否則為 。

span.span: if the control is not visible; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 布林值，指出是否完全捲動項目 （例如，清單方塊中的項目是容器物件的檢視區外） 或摺疊檢視 （例如，在樹狀檢視、 功能表上或最小化的視窗中的項目）。A Boolean value that indicates if an element is completely scrolled (for example, an item in a list box is outside the viewport of the container object) or collapsed (for example, an item in a tree view, menu, or a minimized window) out of view. 如果項目的可點選的點，可能會導致它被已取得焦點，認定為部分的項目超出螢幕時，即使是在螢幕上。If the element has a clickable point that can cause it to be focused, it is considered to be onscreen even when a portion of the element is off screen. 屬性的值不會受到阻擋其他視窗，或項目是否出現在特定的監視。The value of the property is not affected by occlusion by other windows, or by whether the element is visible on a specific monitor. IsOffscreen 時`true,`捲動或摺疊 檢視中，但仍然是使用者的感覺 UI，一部分的項目可以帶回至檢視的簡單的操作，例如捲動或按一下下拉式清單控制項上。When IsOffscreen is `true,` an element that is scrolled or collapsed out of view, but is still part of the end-users perception of the UI, can be brought back into view by simple manipulation, such as scrolling or clicking on a drop-down control. 如果項目，則使用者不會不完全察覺或稱為 「 以程式設計方式隱藏 」 （例如，對話方塊關閉，但會由應用程式快取的加上底線物件） 然後它應該從移除項目樹狀結構，而不是設定的值來 IsOffscreen `true`。If the element is something that the end-user does not perceive at all or is referred to as being "programmatically hidden" (for example, a dialog box that has been dismissed but where the underlining object is cached by the application) then it should be removed from the element tree rather than setting the value of IsOffscreen to `true`. 當這個值是`true`對容器，也很`true`的容器項目子系。When the value is `true` for a container, it is also `true` for the container element's descendants. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsPassword As Boolean
public: property bool IsPassword { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值表示 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目是否包含受保護的內容。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element contains protected content.

value.span: 表示項目包含受保護的內容，否則為 。

span.span: if the element contains protected content; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓應用程式，例如螢幕助讀程式來判斷是否要大聲閱讀文字內容的控制項。This property enables applications such as screen-readers to determine whether the text content of a control should be read aloud. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRequiredForForm As Boolean
public: property bool IsRequiredForForm { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得的值指示表單上的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目是否為必填。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is required to be filled out on a form.

value.span: 表示項目為必填，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is required to be filled out; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemStatus As String
public: property System::String ^ ItemStatus { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得的描述會說明項目 (element) 內某項目 (item) 的狀態。

span.span: Gets a description of the status of an item within an element.

value.span: 狀態的描述。

span.span: The description of the status.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓用戶端，以確定項目是否傳達狀態項目有關的資訊。This property enables a client to ascertain whether an element is conveying status about an item. 例如，訊息的應用程式中的連絡人相關聯的項目可能是 「 忙碌 」 或 「 已連接 」。For example, an item associated with a contact in a messaging application might be "Busy" or "Connected". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemType As String
public: property System::String ^ ItemType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得說明項目型別的描述。

span.span: Gets a description of the type of an item.

value.span: 描述項目之當地語系化字串。

span.span: A localized string that describes the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來取得資訊清單、 樹狀檢視中或資料方格中的項目。This property is used to obtain information about items in a list, tree view, or data grid. 例如，檔案的目錄檢視中的項目可能是 「 文件檔案 」 或 「 資料夾 」。For example, an item in a file directory view might be a "Document File" or a "Folder". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LabeledBy As AutomationElement

summary.span: 取得的項目包含此項目的文字標籤。

span.span: Gets the element that contains the text label for this element.

value.span: 此項目是這個項目的標籤。

span.span: The element that is the label for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以用來擷取，例如，下拉式方塊的靜態文字標籤。This property could be used to retrieve, for example, the static text label for a combo box. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LocalizedControlType As String
public: property System::String ^ LocalizedControlType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項類型的描述。

span.span: Gets a description of the control type.

value.span: 控制項類型 (例如 "button") 的當地語系化描述。

span.span: A localized description of the control type, such as "button".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得項目的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the element.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 項目的名稱。

span.span: The name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目的名稱可用來尋找項目中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目樹狀結構時項目上不支援屬性。The name of an element can be used to find the element in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree when the property is not supported on the element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何擷取屬性。The following example shows how the property is retrieved. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#106)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NativeWindowHandle As Integer
public: property int NativeWindowHandle { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得項目之視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: Gets the handle of the element's window.

value.span: 視窗的控制代碼 (如果存在的話)；否則為 0。

span.span: The handle of the window, if one exists; otherwise 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Orientation As OrientationType

summary.span: 取得控制項的方向。

span.span: Gets the orientation of the control.

value.span: 方向。

span.span: The orientation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 捲軸等可以有垂直或水平方向的滑桿控制項支援這個屬性。This property is supported by controls such as scroll bars and sliders that can have either a vertical or a horizontal orientation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProcessId As Integer
public: property int ProcessId { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得項目的處理序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the process [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of this element.

value.span: 裝載項目處理序的識別碼。

span.span: The ID of the process that hosts the element.

value.span: 屬性的預設值為 0。

span.span: The default value for the property is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理程序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)]由作業系統指派。The process [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is assigned by the operating system. 中可以看到**PID**資料行**處理程序**在 [工作管理員] 索引標籤。It can be seen in the **PID** column of the **Processes** tab in Task Manager. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
